ygData.subject: Hiyas
ygData.msgSnippet: Just signed up on the list, thought I d take a minute to introduce myself :) I m Salr D Taynkk, Dark Warrior of The Kith, Veeshan.  I m 24th, will be 25th
ygData.messageBody:
Just signed up on the list, thought I'd take a minute to introduce myself :)

I'm Salr D'Taynkk, Dark Warrior of The Kith, Veeshan. I'm 24th, will be 25th tonight (reposte woohoo), Dark Elf warrior. I've been playing since phase 2 and concider myself to be one of the better warriors of the land, not due to my level or my equipment, but because I've been playing for a while and know the role of a warrior in a party. I protect my healer with my life, and will sacrifice myself to ensure the remainder of my party has a few moments to escape....when necessary.

As for weapons, my BBC is my primary weapon, but I also keep my 1h slashing/dual wield skills up by using dual Barbed Leather Whips. I also use archery, mainly for fetching monsters, but also use it when I get to hurt to tank, I'll just back up and fire off arrows until I either get healed or the critter is dead. Archery is a very underrated skill, I've finally got my skill up to mid 80s and with the bow I have I can hit for up to 12 damage, nothing major, but when you are hurt you can still dish out a little damage.

As for the rest of my equipment, I have a Blackend Iron Crown, Grotesque mask, Spiked Collar, Rusty Spiked Pads, Barbed Arms, Blackend Bracers, Blackend Gloves, Dwarven Tunic, Black Iron Girdle, Blackend legplates, Blackend Boots, 2 ony earrings, 2 bands of flesh. Just a couple pieces short of a full set of blackend, can't wait, should have those by the end of the weekend :)

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan
